demo_audio.title: Listen to Your AI Spa Receptionist
demo_audio.description: Hear how our AI handles real spa appointment bookings with natural conversation

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Serenity Spa. I'm Sarah, your virtual assistant. How may I help you today?

transcript.speaker: Client
transcript.text: Hi, I'd like to book a massage appointment for this weekend.

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: I'd be happy to help you book a massage. We have several options available - Swedish, deep tissue, hot stone, or aromatherapy massage. Do you have a preference?

transcript.speaker: Client
transcript.text: I think a deep tissue massage would be perfect.

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Excellent choice! Our deep tissue massage is 60 minutes and costs 280 AED. I have availability on Saturday at 2 PM or Sunday at 11 AM. Which works better for you?
